solution_line_template: In 2005, {kids_2006}/{numerator_2006_to_2005}*{denominator_2006_to_2005}=<<{kids_2006}/{numerator_2006_to_2005}*{denominator_2006_to_2005}={kids_2005}>>{kids_2005} kids came to the cookout.
In 2004, {kids_2005}*{half_factor}=<<{kids_2005}*{half_factor}={kids_2004}>>{kids_2004} kids came to the cookout.
